name: Heart of the Cards (jlewis19)
description: Heart of the Cards is a boss-rush style action game where players will defeat enemies using ranged attacks based on poker hands. The player must strategically discard cards from their hand and use their stored cards to create powerful hands while dodging attacks from bosses to achieve victory. Each boss has new attacks and patterns that the player will have to adapt to in order to escape from the casino they are trapped in.
